title.v: khai báo tham số chấm ăn ca theo bộ phận
title.e: Declare the shift time parameter by department

items.key: (@@admin = 1 or ma_bp in (select a.ma_bp from hrbp a, @@sysDatabaseName..hrquyenbp b where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(a.bp_ref, b.r_access2) = 1 and b.user_id = @@userID)) and status = '1'
items.check: (@@admin = 1 or ma_bp in (select a.ma_bp from hrbp a, @@sysDatabaseName..hrquyenbp b where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(a.bp_ref, b.r_access2) = 1 and b.user_id = @@userID))

command.text: declare @$exists nvarchar(512), @$recordHasBeenChanged nvarchar(512), @$duplicate nvarchar(512), @$existsShift nvarchar(512) select @$exists = case when @@language = 'V' then N'Khai báo ký hiệu công ăn ca của bộ phận %s tại ngày %d đã tồn tại, không lưu được.' else N'The shift symbol declaration of department %s on date %d already exists, it can not be saved.' end select @$recordHasBeenChanged = case when @@language = 'V' then N'Bản ghi hiện thời đã được sửa hoặc xóa bởi người sử dụng khác.' else N'This item has been modified or deleted by another user.' end select @$existsShift = case when @@language = 'V' then N'Khai báo ký hiệu công ăn ca %s của %d bị trùng hoặc lồng nhau, không lưu được.' else N'The declaration of shift symbol %s of %d is duplicated or nested and cannot be saved.' end

if exists(select * from @@table where ngay_hl = @ngay_hl and ma_bp = @ma_bp) begin select 'ngay_hl' as field, replace(replace(@$exists, '%s', rtrim(@ma_bp)), '%d', convert(varchar(10), @ngay_hl, 113)) as message return end
declare @dsShiftDuplidated varchar(1024) declare @dsShiftDuplidatedTable table (data varchar(8)) if @ds_ma_ca1 <> '' begin if exists (select 1 from dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$Split(@ds_ma_ca1, ',') where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(data, @ds_ma_ca2) = 1 and @ds_ma_ca2 <> '') or exists (select 1 from dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$Split(@ds_ma_ca1, ',') where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(data, @ds_ma_ca3) = 1 and @ds_ma_ca3 <> '') begin
delete from @dsShiftDuplidatedTable insert into @dsShiftDuplidatedTable select data from dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$Split(@ds_ma_ca1, ',') where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(data, @ds_ma_ca2) = 1 union select data from dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$Split(@ds_ma_ca1, ',') where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(data, @ds_ma_ca3) = 1
select @dsShiftDuplidated = COALESCE(@dsShiftDuplidated + ', ', '') + rtrim(data) from @dsShiftDuplidatedTable select 'ds_ma_ca1' as field, replace(replace(@$existsShift, '%s', rtrim(@dsShiftDuplidated)), '%d', N'Mức 1') as message return end end
if @ds_ma_ca2 <> '' begin if exists (select 1 from dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$Split(@ds_ma_ca2, ',') where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(data, @ds_ma_ca1) = 1 and @ds_ma_ca1 <> '') or exists (select 1 from dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$Split(@ds_ma_ca2, ',') where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(data, @ds_ma_ca3) = 1 and @ds_ma_ca3 <> '') begin
delete from @dsShiftDuplidatedTable insert into @dsShiftDuplidatedTable select data from dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$Split(@ds_ma_ca2, ',') where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(data, @ds_ma_ca1) = 1 union select data from dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$Split(@ds_ma_ca2, ',') where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(data, @ds_ma_ca3) = 1
select @dsShiftDuplidated = COALESCE(@dsShiftDuplidated + ', ', '') + rtrim(data) from @dsShiftDuplidatedTable
select 'ds_ma_ca1' as field, replace(replace(@$existsShift, '%s', rtrim(@dsShiftDuplidated)), '%d', N'Mức 2') as message return end end
if @ds_ma_ca3 <> '' begin if exists (select 1 from dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$Split(@ds_ma_ca3, ',') where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(data, @ds_ma_ca1) = 1 and @ds_ma_ca1 <> '') or exists (select 1 from dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$Split(@ds_ma_ca3, ',') where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(data, @ds_ma_ca2) = 1 and @ds_ma_ca2 <> '') begin
delete from @dsShiftDuplidatedTable insert into @dsShiftDuplidatedTable select data from dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$Split(@ds_ma_ca3, ',') where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(data, @ds_ma_ca1) = 1 union select data from dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$Split(@ds_ma_ca3, ',') where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(data, @ds_ma_ca2) = 1
select @dsShiftDuplidated = COALESCE(@dsShiftDuplidated + ', ', '') + rtrim(data) from @dsShiftDuplidatedTable
select 'ds_ma_ca1' as field, replace(replace(@$existsShift, '%s', rtrim(@dsShiftDuplidated)), '%d', N'Mức 3') as message return end end
select @datetime0 = getdate(), @datetime2 = getdate(), @user_id0 = @@userID, @user_id2 = @@userID

if not exists(select * from @@table where ngay_hl = $ngay_hl.OldValue and ma_bp = $ma_bp.OldValue) begin select 'ngay_hl' as field, @$recordHasBeenChanged as message return end if ((@ngay_hl <> $ngay_hl.OldValue) or (@ma_bp <> $ma_bp.OldValue)) begin if exists(select * from @@table where ngay_hl = @ngay_hl and ma_bp = @ma_bp and not (ngay_hl = $ngay_hl.OldValue and ma_bp = $ma_bp.OldValue)) begin select 'ngay_hl' as field, replace(replace(@$exists, '%s', rtrim(@ma_bp)), '%d', convert(varchar(10), @ngay_hl, 113)) as message return end end
declare @dsShiftDuplidated varchar(1024) declare @dsShiftDuplidatedTable table (data varchar(8)) if @ds_ma_ca1 <> '' begin if exists (select 1 from dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$Split(@ds_ma_ca1, ',') where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(data, @ds_ma_ca2) = 1 and @ds_ma_ca2 <> '') or exists (select 1 from dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$Split(@ds_ma_ca1, ',') where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(data, @ds_ma_ca3) = 1 and @ds_ma_ca3 <> '') begin
delete from @dsShiftDuplidatedTable insert into @dsShiftDuplidatedTable select data from dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$Split(@ds_ma_ca1, ',') where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(data, @ds_ma_ca2) = 1 union select data from dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$Split(@ds_ma_ca1, ',') where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(data, @ds_ma_ca3) = 1
select @dsShiftDuplidated = COALESCE(@dsShiftDuplidated + ', ', '') + rtrim(data) from @dsShiftDuplidatedTable select 'ds_ma_ca1' as field, replace(replace(@$existsShift, '%s', rtrim(@dsShiftDuplidated)), '%d', N'Mức 1') as message return end end
if @ds_ma_ca2 <> '' begin if exists (select 1 from dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$Split(@ds_ma_ca2, ',') where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(data, @ds_ma_ca1) = 1 and @ds_ma_ca1 <> '') or exists (select 1 from dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$Split(@ds_ma_ca2, ',') where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(data, @ds_ma_ca3) = 1 and @ds_ma_ca3 <> '') begin
delete from @dsShiftDuplidatedTable insert into @dsShiftDuplidatedTable select data from dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$Split(@ds_ma_ca2, ',') where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(data, @ds_ma_ca1) = 1 union select data from dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$Split(@ds_ma_ca2, ',') where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(data, @ds_ma_ca3) = 1
select @dsShiftDuplidated = COALESCE(@dsShiftDuplidated + ', ', '') + rtrim(data) from @dsShiftDuplidatedTable
select 'ds_ma_ca1' as field, replace(replace(@$existsShift, '%s', rtrim(@dsShiftDuplidated)), '%d', N'Mức 2') as message return end end
if @ds_ma_ca3 <> '' begin if exists (select 1 from dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$Split(@ds_ma_ca3, ',') where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(data, @ds_ma_ca1) = 1 and @ds_ma_ca1 <> '') or exists (select 1 from dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$Split(@ds_ma_ca3, ',') where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(data, @ds_ma_ca2) = 1 and @ds_ma_ca2 <> '') begin
delete from @dsShiftDuplidatedTable insert into @dsShiftDuplidatedTable select data from dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$Split(@ds_ma_ca3, ',') where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(data, @ds_ma_ca1) = 1 union select data from dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$Split(@ds_ma_ca3, ',') where dbo.ff_ExactInlist(data, @ds_ma_ca2) = 1
select @dsShiftDuplidated = COALESCE(@dsShiftDuplidated + ', ', '') + rtrim(data) from @dsShiftDuplidatedTable
select 'ds_ma_ca1' as field, replace(replace(@$existsShift, '%s', rtrim(@dsShiftDuplidated)), '%d', N'Mức 3') as message return end end
update @@table set datetime2 = getdate(), user_id2 = @@userID where ngay_hl = $ngay_hl.OldValue and ma_bp = $ma_bp.OldValue
